review: Very friendly and warm. Doesn't believe in over the top medication. Is extremely calm and puts you at ease too specially when anything related to children can get very stressful. Very well organised with appointments for check up or vaccinations. A child friendly clinic too.
She is a fabulous doctor, highly recommended . Both our kids get treated from her and she is like family now

Excellent services. She is nice lady and cooperative. *** ********* *** nature is very good.
**** ***********

Dr Sumita chawla is an excellent doctor.she is also very patient compassionate and understanding.i trust my doctor opinion and always take their suggestions.*** ** *** ** *** **** *********** *** **************

review: Good doctor. Diagnosis provided as per requirement rather than forcing and conducting tests.. Understands the problem and issues faced by parents.
